subject: Re: Update - Infinio  Catalogue
preview: Hi Nikki,  I hope you're doing well.  We’re currently working on your task for the Phonak Marketing website and have encountered an issue while attempting to upload a large file. Unfortunately, the

full_threads.body:
Hi Nikki,

I hope you're doing well.

We’re currently working on your task for the Phonak Marketing website and have encountered an issue while attempting to upload a large file. Unfortunately, the file size exceeds the available storage space on the site, which may result in additional charges.

Here are a couple of options we can explore:
  • Increase Storage: We can add an additional 10GB of storage to the site for $10.
  • External Hosting: If you have a Google Drive link or another cloud storage service, we can upload the file there and link it directly from the website.
Please let us know which option you’d prefer, or if you have an alternative solution in mind.

Best regards,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body: @andy Yes, this is actually the one Joel mentioned. @joel let me know how you'd like to proceed with this.
Thanks @ricaR - I think we decided not to do this in the steering committee and avoid large uploads given diskspace and CSN usage?
@andy I can't upload the files due to it's large size. I'm waiting for @joel to upload it in the backend.
@ricaR - can you complete and close this one out?
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Thanks guys,

I can still see one more of the videos still in the Product Animations folder. Please remove this one also.



Thanks.

Nikki

Hi Nikki,

No worries. Confirming that I have removed he highlighted videos from Audeo I Sphere Assets.

Here's the link:
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/infinio/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Sorry guys,

I forgot to advise that we need to also remove these three videos from the tile below:

Thanks

Nikki

Thanks guys but the video file still appears. Please remove.



Nikki

Hi Nikki, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/infinio/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi,



thank you for your email, I am currently on leave with no access to emails.



I will endeavour to get back to you as soon as possible upon my return 30th May.



If your matter is urgent, please contact Phonak Customer Service on 1800 809 321 or Cameron Sinclair cameron.sinclair@sonova.com

Regards,



Melinda

Hi Nikki,

I'd be happy to assist you today.

It seems the image wasn't attached to your email. Could you please send us the updated image for Infinio at your earliest convenience?

Looking forward to your reply.
